reviews.text: Nice helpful staff but them toilets never get cleaned they are disgusting the smell is something else 🤢
I lost my purse on train. Can’t believe honest staff found it nd handed in. Wonderful service. Thank you so much.

Photos of yesteryear would probably surprise the casual visitor in revealing just how extensive was the station and itʼs accoutrements at one time, and although now much diminished some of the charm still remains – most notably in the canopy and substantial main building. The latter was sympathetically modernised in 2009, so todayʼs rail user probably has the best of both worlds, trains into Liverpool probably now being considerably more regular than they were in the days of steam. The same, alas, cannot be said of services to Preston  and there are also no through trains.
Nice place. It is a terminus on the Ormskirk- Liverpool Central Line. It’s also a terminus on the Ormskirk-Preston line operated by Northern. Love the station
